title: AlphaTALKS Wall Street Breakfast December 18: What Moved Markets This Week
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Stocks gave up ground this week in volatile trading action. The Federal Reserve on Wednesday reinforced the hawkish stance set at its previous meeting, but stocks unexpectedly rallied after the announcement. These gains were quickly given back the following day and into a choppy Friday session. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
